text: Walter Arnold Hadlee was born on 4 June 1915. He died on 29 September 2006. He was a New Zealand cricketer and Test match captain. He played first-class cricket. Three of his five sons were Sir Richard, Dayle, and Barry. They also played cricket for New Zealand. The Chappellâ€“Hadlee Trophy is named after the Hadlee family. == References == ==Other websites== * *Walter Hadlee dies aged 91, Cricinfo, 29 September 2006. * Obituary, The Times, 30 September 2006 Category:1915 births Category:2006 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Walter Hadlee
